newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: BMC sees '97 revenue exceeding $550 mln.
newsitem.headline: BMC sees '97 revenue exceeding $550 mln.

text.p: US database management products company BMC Software expects its revenue to exceed US$550 million for the year ending March 31 1997, said chairman Max Watson on Friday.
He said 1998 revenue and profit growth should at lease match 1997 growth rates.
"We will do in excess of $550 million in revenues in the year ending March 1997," Watson told reporters at a briefing in Singapore.
He said revenue and profit growth in 1997 would be slightly more than 25 percent.
The company's current expectations for 1998 was to match at least 1997 growth, he said.
The company has been achieving pretax margins of about 40 percent and he expects this to be maintained.
